div.head: 大腸壅結
div.div: obstruction of the large intestine with nodes

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: obstruction of the large intestine with nodes

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with da bian mi 大便秘② , constipation. Pu ji fang 普濟方 39: 粉糖丸，治大 腸壅結不通 , “Pills with powdered sugar cure obstruction of the large intestine with nodes , with no passage possible”.
